title: K9 (TV series)
summary: K-9 is a British-Australian science-fiction adventure series focusing on the adventures of the robot dog K9 from the television show Doctor Who, achieved by mixing computer animation and live action.[3] It is aimed at an audience of 11- to 15-year-olds.[4] A single series of the programme was made in Brisbane, Australia, with co-production funding from Australia and the United Kingdom.[5] It aired in 2009 and 2010 on Network Ten in Australia, and on Disney XD in the UK, as well as being broadcast on other Disney XD channels in Europe.
